thread.title: Acceptable
thread.title_full: Acceptable - Review of Citadines Bastille Gare de Lyon Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: iliv4food
title: Acceptable
text:
Stayed for a week for a good price.
Positives: near subway stop, Franprix across the way, comfy bed good heat.
NÃ©gatives: sirens near the hospital
No plastic in tub can easily slide and fall. Mais service only once a week you have to empty your trash in basement.
I would stay again in winter at a good price. Someone came in room while my daughter was there "hello"
